Accumulation.NAME: Accumulation
Accumulation.DESCRIPTION: If you fly: Lose !M! Flight. NL Gain [E] at the start of each turn.

Armor_Brew.NAME: Armor Brew
Armor_Brew.DESCRIPTION: Draw !MISC! card. Brew a Block Potion in !M! turns.
Armor_Brew.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !MISC! card. NL Brew a Block Potion in !M! turns.

Catch_Me_If_You_Can.NAME: Catch Me If You Can
Catch_Me_If_You_Can.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Flight. At the start of your next turn, lose !M! Flight.

Explosive_Brew.NAME: Explosive Brew
Explosive_Brew.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Brew an Explosive Potion in !M! turns.

Fly.NAME: Fly
Fly.DESCRIPTION: If you don't fly, gain !M! Flight.

How_To_Befriend_A_Turtle.NAME: How To Befriend A Turtle
How_To_Befriend_A_Turtle.DESCRIPTION: Gain X Block. NL Gain X [E].
How_To_Befriend_A_Turtle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain X + !B! Block. NL Gain X [E].

How_To_Murder_Ants.NAME: How To Murder Ants
How_To_Murder_Ants.DESCRIPTION: If you fly: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times.
How_To_Murder_Ants.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you fly: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X + !M! times.

How_To_Warm_Elephants.NAME: How To Warm Elephants
How_To_Warm_Elephants.DESCRIPTION: Brew a Fire Potion in NL !M! -X turns.

On_The_Head.NAME: On The Head
On_The_Head.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you fly: Draw !M! card and gain [E].

Pincer_Repair.NAME: Pincer Repair
Pincer_Repair.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The enemy gains !M! Artifact.

Pour_Tar_Pitch.NAME: Pour Tar Pitch
Pour_Tar_Pitch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you fly: Affects ALL enemies.

Quackster.NAME: Quackster
Quackster.DESCRIPTION: Brew a random Potion in !M! turns.

Salty_Strike.NAME: Salty Strike
Salty_Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. The enemy gains !M! Thirsty.

Swoop_Down.NAME: Swoop Down
Swoop_Down.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage per Flight you have. NL Lose !M! Flight.
